title: Macbook air 820-3023-A no green light
message:
When I plug the power cable there are curent on ppbus g3h and the 3v42 was also here. but the green light not be there ?
I change the u6900 but no change. The 3v42 (3v39 in real) was on the u6900 but the green light don't turn on . Why ??
please to help me :-)

title: Macbook air 820-3023-A no green light
message: What is  the voltage on PPBUS_G3H??? Also check for corrosion on I/O board or flex....

title: Macbook air 820-3023-A no green light
message: Known good IO board and flat cable are also a good place to start. But PPBUS voltage can tell a lot too.

title: Macbook air 820-3023-A no green light
message: SMC is not running, check if SMC_RESET L is present, if yes, check diode mode on SMBUS_SMC_BSA_SCL and SMBUS_SMC_BSA_SDA, this could be a bad ISL6259 or a bad SMC...

title: Macbook air 820-3023-A no green light
message:
I found 0.67v for SMC_RESET L
and diode mode 0.79v on SMBUS_SMC_BSA_SCL and SMBUS_SMC_BSA_SDA

title: Macbook air 820-3023-A no green light
message: Those readings are all sorts of weird. Pin 8 is a simple regulator output and should be 3V, pin 6 should also be high. Are you sure this is correct? Seems like U5100 could be dead or corroded trace to pin 1 or 3.

title: Macbook air 820-3023-A no green light
message:
Ok i changed the u5010 and now it boot :-)
thanks ! ;-)
BUT now the power button don’t works. All keys are working. So I think the button not is the real problem. I used a ssd from a mbp so perhaps it is that because the mbp have is button not on the keyboard ????

title: Macbook air 820-3023-A no green light
message: Firstly connect a known good separate keyboard to rule that out.

title: Macbook air 820-3023-A no green light
message: I have no other MacBook Air on the hand

title: Macbook air 820-3023-A no green light
message: All keyboard have the same pinout. You can even use a separate keyboard from a macbook pro. Any macbook keyboard will be ok for testing.

title: Macbook air 820-3023-A no green light
message: I have used the touch’s on the circuit for the power on and it doesn’t work ! So it is not the keyboard ?

title: Macbook air 820-3023-A no green light
message:
I have used the touch’s on the circuit for the power on and it doesn’t work

I have no idea what you mean.

title: Macbook air 820-3023-A no green light
message:
sorry I am French
I have shorted the power-on pads and it don't boot

title: Macbook air 820-3023-A no green light
message: Check continuity from power on pads to R5070. If OK then remove U5010 and do a diode mode reading on the power on pads.
